Diablo 3 Acts

Source: R/data.R
d3acts.Rd

A dataset containing all available Acts in the Diablo 3 storyline.

d3acts

Format

A data frame with 39 rows and 6 variables:

id

Act ID: 87700, 72095, ...

act

Act: Act I, Act II, ...

act_slug

Act Slug: act-ii, act-ii, ...

number

Act Number: 1, 2, ...

name

Act Name: The Fallen Star, The Legacy of Cain, ...

name_slug

Act Name Slug: the-fallen-star, the-legacy-of-cain, ...

Source

https://develop.battle.net/documentation/api-reference
